reason: You are my Sundari. Meeting you makes me happy. It relaxes me, relieving me of all worries. Time freezes so it is just you and me. I love you.
You are my sleeping partner. Irrespective of what time it is or what work we have to do, I can always cuddle with you and sleep like a baby. I love you.
You scratch my head for me. Your nails sometimes hurt, but there is nothing better than laying down in your lap with your fingers in my hair. I love you.
You take care of me. When I am sick, I rarely take care of myself. I would drink a cold Starbucks coffee with a sore throat, but you scold me. I love you.
You look gorgeous. Every day. Hotter when you have nothing but a towel wrapped around you and are still a little wet after bathing. I love you.
You are my travelling partner. We have seen so much of Hyderabad with you sitting behind me on the activa or vice versa. You make Hyderabad better. I love you.

You understand me. You pick up on the smallest of fluctuations in my mood. I have become more receptive towards sharing thoughts and feelings. I love you.
You give great gifts. I will always have the card with our photo on the back of my phone. I can always look at you. I can always feel close to you. I love you.

You are my Don. You scold me, you scare me, you terrify me. But above all, you care for me and love me. I love you.
You are my nautanki. You sometimes pick up mock fights. I find that very cute. Ladai karne se pyaar badhta hai. Ladai na ho rahi ho toh nautanki kar lo. I love you.
You let me give you a back massage. Always a good reason to slowly take of your clothes piece by piece and press my hands across your bare back. I love you.
You swallow jellys, melodies, bhoot chips. It is very funny and cute to come back to a pile of wrappers on the floor, and you acting like you didn't do it. I love you.

You are really good with your tongue, but let's keep this PG-13. I love you.
